content.rendered:
First AI Launchpad integrated on Meteora

Launch a coin with an AI Prompt

Partners & Integrations

AI-Assisted Token Creation & Launchpad

PumpAI scans Crypto Twitter for trending metas to have the most up to date information on whats popular right now. 

PumpAI will use all the information and tools at its disposal to help you create your coin. Everything you need: descriptions, images, tokens and pools will all be handled by the AI. All you need to do is prompt it.

Tokens launched on PumpAI will be tradeable directly on PumpAI. Users will be able to bid on them until the bonding curve (set marketcap) is reached. Once the bonding curve is reached the token’s LP will automatically transfer to Meteora and will become tradeable on Meteora. Being able to bid on tokens on PumpAI allows users to get in on new launches on day 0, basically before the tokens even hit any markets.

How does PUMPAI work

1

2

3

4

Tell AI about your coin

Launch your coin on PumpAI with a Bonding curve

Coin trades on PumpAI Until Bonding Curve is Reached

Meteora launch & staking opens

Why PumpAI?

No tech needed

Create and deploy tokens effortlessly without any coding skills required.

 ️️Devs & hodlers earn w/o selling

Generate passive incomes through Meteora’s DLMM yield without selling.

Customize launch marketcap (v1.1)

Set your tokens initial marketcap according to your preferences of where the bonding curve ends.

Staking pools with built-in rewards

Establish staking pools that offer integrated rewards for participants.

Rewards
for top traders

Incentivize leading traders with appealing rewards to boost engagement.

...and there's more

PUMPAI is building on Meteora

PumpAI is building on Meteora & Solana as both are fast growing and have high mind share. This will be the first AI launchpad built on Meteora that offers built in staking pools for token projects and offers developers and stakers the ability to earn Solana rewards driven by Meteora’s DLMM systems.

PumpAI’s target market for activity is valued in the billions, drawing comparisons to the high transaction volumes seen in platforms like Meteora. PumpAI is positioned to capture significant value and drive substantial growth.

Pump AI is positioned to thrive within the rapidly expanding Solana ecosystem, which is projected to grow from USD 116 billion in 2024 to USD 3 Trillion by 2035, with a yearly growth of 35%. Solana’s record of 67 million daily transactions underscores its scalability, making it a prime environment for Pump AI to capitalize on this growth.

PUMPAI User Funnels

Integration with Meteora for Unmatched Growth

PumpAI is uniquely integrated with Meteora, a platform boasting millions of active users, making it the first and only launchpad to seamlessly connect with this ecosystem.

This strategic integration leverages advanced technology to efficiently channel Meteora’s vast user base directly to PumpAI, driving unparalleled user acquisition and engagement.

Powerful User Acquisition through Cherry Ecosystem

PumpAI collaborates with the Cherry ecosystem to execute precision-targeted user acquisition campaigns, reaching millions of Web3 users and generating massive impressions.

Cherry’s success, including driving over 100k users to OKX in a single campaign, underscores its effectiveness in bringing a broad and engaged audience to PumpAI.

Boosting Growth with Cross-Marketing from Trading Bots

PumpAI leverages cross-marketing with over 10 trading and sniping bots, tapping into a highly active Web3 audience focused on trading.

These bots, collectively used by millions, align perfectly with the core user base of launchpads like PumpAI, making cross-promotions a powerful driver of platform growth.

PUMPAI Daily Volume Potentials

PumpAI introduces a dynamic trading ecosystem where every token launched must align with a bonding curve model, ensuring continuous market activity. Similar launchpads leveraging this mechanism have achieved daily trading volumes reaching millions of dollars.

With PumpAI, every trade contributes to growth, and a modest 1% fee on all trades sustains the platform while driving innovation.

PUMPAI Token Economy

Ready for the new Meta?
